This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html
This application has been developed by three student of TELECOM Nancy. This is the Android version of Homebank (see Credit tab).

HomeBank4Android is an adaptation of HomeBank. HomeBank is a desktop software mainly developed by Maxime DOYEN.\n\nHomeBank is an open source program that aim to help you manage your personal accounting.
You can find the original program here: http://homebank.free.fr/
You can find the full list of contributors here: https://launchpad.net/homebank/+topcontributors
Some icons are from Everaldo Coelho.
Some icons are from Alexander Moore.

Welcome to HomeBank4Android, the free adaptation of HomeBank (see About). HomeBank4Android uses the same xhb file as desktop HomeBank application.

We recommend you to sync your xhb file between your computer and your Android device with a third-party solution like BitTorrent Sync which you can found here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bittorrent.sync
You can find more details about BitTorrent Sync here: https://www.getsync.com

On the next screen you will be asked to select your xhb file on your device.

For now HomeBank4Android is only a viewer, you will not be able to add or edit operations.
